CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL( Publisher_name__c , "Min mave"),IMAGE("/resource/PublisherLogos/Minmave.png", "Min mave",85, 200), IF(ISPICKVAL( Publisher_name__c , "Forbrugsforeningen"),IMAGE("/resource/PublisherLogos/Forbrugsforeningen.png", "Forbrugesforeningen",85, 100), IF( OR(ISPICKVAL( Publisher_name__c , "website"),ISPICKVAL( Publisher_name__c , "egentic"),ISPICKVAL( Publisher_name__c , "facebook")),IMAGE("/resource/PublisherLogos/DinFamilieJurist.png" , "other",85, 200), IF(ISPICKVAL( Publisher_name__c , "Danske Seniorer"),IMAGE("/resource/PublisherLogos/DanskeSeniorer.png", "Danske Seniorer",85, 100), IF(ISPICKVAL( Publisher_name__c , "Forsikringshjælp.nu"),IMAGE("/resource/PublisherLogos/forsikringshjaelp.png", "Forsikringshjælp",100, 300), IF(ISPICKVAL( Publisher_name__c , "Børn i byen"),IMAGE("/resource/PublisherLogos/bornibyen.png", "Børn i byen",85, 200), IF(ISPICKVAL( Publisher_name__c , "Nyhedsbreve"),IMAGE("/resource/PublisherLogos/nyhedsbrev.png", "Nyhedsbrev",85, 200), IF(ISPICKVAL( Publisher_name__c , "Reshopper"),IMAGE("/resource/PublisherLogos/reshopper.PNG", "reshopper",85, 100), IF(ISPICKVAL( Publisher_name__c , "HK"),IMAGE("/resource/PublisherLogos/HK.PNG", "HK",85, 100), IF(ISPICKVAL( Publisher_name__c , "Folkeskolen"),IMAGE("/resource/PublisherLogos/Folkeskolen.PNG", "Folkeskolen",85, 100), IF(ISPICKVAL( Publisher_name__c , "Samvirke"),IMAGE("/resource/PublisherLogos/Samvirke.PNG", "Samvirke",85, 100), "")))))))))))
CustomField.label: Publisher Image
